message: Hi Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above $11000. Can you consider my offer?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit short on the price. I'm willing to consider a compromise. I'm thinking of offering it to you for $11500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business. What do you think?
